errors.title: Error
errors.unknown:
Something went wrong! {EMOTE_WARNING}
Report this error to bot's Owner/Developer!
errors.request_error: There was an error while handling the request. Make sure that my message wasn't deleted and that I have sufficient permissions!

missing_perms.self: I lack the permission `{permission}` for this.
missing_perms.self_channel: I lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this.
missing_perms.other: You lack the permission `{permission}` for this command.
missing_perms.other_channel: You lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this command.

errors.no_send_perm: I have no permission to send messages in your channel. Pls fix!
errors.guild_not_setup: Server is not configured! Check `/help` for setup command.
errors.access_level_low: You don't have necessary access level to perform this command.

command.not_owner: Only an owner may run this command.
command.nsfw: This command may only be used in NSFW text channels!
command.guild_only: This command cannot be used in private messages! Use this command in server, where I am.

cooldown.cooldown_left: That command is on cooldown for {time} more seconds

formatter.except_seconds: Provided time can't be specified in seconds
formatter.no_multip: Could not get time multiplication from given character
formatter.parse_long: Could not parse provided time due to owerflow or other error
formatter.long_overflow: Provided time too big, long overflow

interaction.no_values: None of the values has been selected.
interaction.no_access: You cannot perform this action because you do not have the required access level.

ticket.role_footer:
*After the issuance of roles - the request will be deleted.*
*Do not close the ticket, wait for the moderator!*

You can also run `/help category:[category]` to show the commands of a specific category.

verification.failed_role: Verification error, failed to issue a role! Report this issue to the server Administration.
verification.role_removed:
You are unverified in __{server}__ server, as you don't have linked Steam account.
Complete verification by following instructions in verification channel.

embed.title: Link your account to complete verification
embed.guide:
1. Go to the project website https://unionteams.ru/
2. Login to your Personal account via Steam
3. Link your Discord account in the Personal account

listener.wait_value: If you haven't linked your account yet, follow the instructions above.
